
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(spdk-lib-nvmf)
target_compile_options(spdk-lib-nvmf PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(spdk-lib-nvmf PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(spdk-lib-nvmf PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-ibdrv
  spdk-lib-accel
  spdk-lib-bdev
  spdk-lib-json
  spdk-lib-jsonrpc
  spdk-lib-log
  spdk-lib-nvme
  spdk-lib-rdma
  spdk-lib-rpc
  spdk-lib-sock
  spdk-lib-thread
  spdk-lib-trace
  spdk-lib-util
)
target_sources(spdk-lib-nvmf PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/ctrlr.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/ctrlr_bdev.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/ctrlr_discovery.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/subsystem.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/transport.c
)

add_global_library_for(spdk-lib-nvmf.global spdk-lib-nvmf)
target_compile_options(spdk-lib-nvmf.global PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(spdk-lib-nvmf.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(spdk-lib-nvmf.global PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-ibdrv
  spdk-lib-accel
  spdk-lib-bdev
  spdk-lib-json
  spdk-lib-jsonrpc
  spdk-lib-log
  spdk-lib-nvme
  spdk-lib-rdma
  spdk-lib-rpc
  spdk-lib-sock
  spdk-lib-thread
  spdk-lib-trace
  spdk-lib-util
)
target_sources(spdk-lib-nvmf.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/nvmf.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/nvmf_rpc.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/rdma.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/nvmf/tcp.c
)
